reviews.review_comment: I have both the Kiki’s Delivery Service and the Totoro log sets. Both are beautiful, weighty, high quality. The detail is stunning— although the ladybug is, erm, too detailed. But it’s more of a me issue since I’m deathly afraid of bugs.
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023

reviews.review_comment: This is the perfect gift for any Studio Ghibli or Spirited Away fan. You can literally come up with thousands of positions for the characters and accessories. It looks so cute on my desk at work. Recommend as a gift for sure!
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023

reviews.review_comment: This is an excellent set of Totoro and friends.  The detail is fantastic and I’m so happy I could get this set because it was sold out at my local Barnes and noble so I had to order it from Amazon!  My fiancé is obsessed and is a collector and she gives this a big five star rating! Love love love it!
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023

reviews.review_comment: This was smaller than I had originally thought it was gonna be so it makes me nervous I’m gonna lose one of the pieces. But it is really good quality and I Iove it sm. I did have trouble stacking it, but maybe I’m just not good a stacking things. Even so it still looks really nice.
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023

reviews.review_title: If you have a Totoro fan.. this is fabulous!
reviews.review_comment: Amazing detail and they are made well.. fun trying to stack them. My six year old went crazy over this!
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023

reviews.review_comment: My granddaughter is a huge Miyazaki fan. I got this for her birthday. Now I’m the best grandma ever!

reviews.review_comment: Just like the pictures just hard to balance but love it

reviews.review_title: Pricey but worth the money for a Totoro fan
reviews.review_comment: For how tiny this set is, the price is a bit stiff. However, it's incredibly well made. All figurines are painted with great care and can be played with as a full collection or individual pieces. My kid loves the "little one, a bigger one, and a HUGE one", as they are exactly as portrayed in a beloved film. Highly recommend to any Totoro fan out there.
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023

reviews.review_comment: This item looks great on Amazon but the product is so much better in person. I highly recommend.
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
